Description.Text: Standing majestically 50 metres from Dalian Harbour, Conrad Dalian features an indoor pool and fitness centre. Soundproofed rooms come with harbour or city views. Free parking is provided. Conrad Dalian is situated next to Dalian International Convention Centre and 4 km from Renming Pedestrian Street and Dalian Train Station. Zhoushuizi Airport is 14 km away.
Conrad Dalian is situated next to Dalian International Convention Centre and 4 km from Renming Pedestrian Street and Dalian Train Station

The King Deluxe Room is generously apportioned at 45 square metres/148 square feet and features a King-size bed. Offering panoramic views of the Dalian seaport, each room is stylishly appointed with contemporary luxury.
Modern building Standing majestically 50 metres from Dalian Harbour
Guests can enjoy a selection of fresh seafood at C Grill. Drinks are served at Yun, M Bar and Lobby Lounge.
The hotel has a medium size lobby.

RoomType.text: King Deluxe Room 1 King Deluxe Room 48

Message.Text: Important notices: In case of any amendment please contact us to check the rates and conditions as these could change - Hotel will invoice the total amount of this booking in case of no show / En caso de modificacion, por favor contacten con nosotros para verificar las tarifas y condiciones de la reserva ya que podrian ser diferentes - En caso de no show el hotel se reserva el derecho de aplicar gastos del 100%
